long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export Facebook Friends List with Ease Using FB Friend Exporter

Simplify and enhance your Facebook networking by exporting a user's entire friends list with our powerful browser extension. 
Whether youâ€™re researching, organizing, or expanding connections, FB Friend Exporter allows you to export friends lists effortlessly using just the user's ID or profile URLs.

ğŸš€ Key Features:
âœ“ Friends List Export: Easily extract and download a user's complete friends list  
âœ“ Profile-Based Export: Use user ID or profile URL for targeted exports  
âœ“ Smart Filtering: Apply filters to extract specific types of friends  
âœ“ Customizable Intervals: Ensure smooth, safe request sending

# Supported fields:
- ID
- Name
- Gender
- Avatar URL
- Profile URL
- Age
- Birthday
- Hometown
- Location
- Languages
- Locale

# Why Choose FB Friend Exporter:
ğŸš€ Boost Productivity: No more manual copying and pastingâ€”export complete friends lists in a matter of seconds.
ğŸ’¡ Easy to Use: Our intuitive design ensures a smooth, hassle-free experience for everyone.
âš™ï¸ Tailored for You: Customizable options let you filter and export exactly what you need.
ğŸ” Privacy First: Keep your data safe and secureâ€”everything remains on your local device.
ğŸ“Š Power Through Research: Efficiently gather and organize friends data for your business, marketing, or research needs.

# How to Get Started:
1. Click the extension icon and click the 'Open the APP' button
2. Enter a user's ID or profile URL and Click 'Import' button
3. Export their friends list instantly!  

ğŸ“¬ FAQ:
Experiencing issues? Please describe details and send us the corresponding screenshot, and we will do some troubleshooting and compatibility.

For perfect use, it is recommended to set the Facebook language to English.

ğŸ” Data Privacy:
Your privacy is our priority. All data is stored locally on your device, keeping your information 100% secure and private.

â­ About Pro:
FB Friend Exporter offers basic functionalities for free, with advanced features available through an upgrade.
